import { memo, useContext } from 'react' import { CommonDataForAllViewService } from '../ViewInformationServicePending' import City from '../../Data/city.json' function ViewInformationAccommodation({ languageSelected }) { const service = useContext(CommonDataForAllViewService) const handleBlur = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #D9D9D9' } const handleFocus = (input) => { input.style.border = 'solid 1px #4874E8' } return ( <>
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} value={service.propertyName} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} type='number' min={0} />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='address' className="input-inline" type='text' />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='website' className="input-inline" type='text' />
handleFocus(e.target)} onBlur={(e) => handleBlur(e.target)} id='taxCode' className="input-inline" type='text' />
